intro: Fantasy battle of EmyLiveShow vtubers — fight or fall to temptation!
description: Have you always dreamed of finding a great group for tabletop RPGs? This time, you can dive headfirst into thrilling adventures! EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale is the continuation of Dragon & Mistresses Tale — now featuring a fully customizable protagonist! Meet Amy, Nia, Uma, and Six in person, get to know them better, and of course, play through an exciting fantasy story about saving the world… that might just turn into a wild party! EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale is a visual novel styled after a tabletop RPG, complete with dice roll mechanics. Create your own protagonist. You can choose gender and appearance at the start, but that’s not all — your choices and opinions will shape the hero’s personality and how others treat them. Follow two parallel story levels. While untangling the main plot, don’t forget those sitting at the table with you! Playing along with one of them might be the best way to win her favor… Test your luck. Dice rolls determine the outcome of your actions — but even failure moves the story forward. Sometimes a setback can be more exciting than success! Discover the continuation of Dragon & Mistresses Tale — or start fresh. The story is told from the perspective of a new player joining the group, so no prior knowledge is required — but returning fans will enjoy many subtle references!
